name: Fireside Merriment
description: A generous spread of hearty meat cuts combining Snezhnayan cured meats with Nod-Krai ham and sausage. Many older Nod-Krai locals like to savor it by the fire with a drink in hand.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Fireside Merriment
suspicious.description: A generous spread of hearty meat cuts. The dense fat, bitter and salty, hits the palate like a runaway carriage, leaving a lingering, oily trail down the throat... an intense assault few could endure.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Fireside Merriment
normal.description: A generous spread of hearty meat cuts combining Snezhnayan cured meats with Nod-Krai ham and sausage. Many older Nod-Krai locals like to savor it by the fire with a drink in hand.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Fireside Merriment
delicious.description: A generous spread of hearty meat cuts. The thick raw cuts carry hints of pine and salt, the sausages give off a deep smoky fragrance, and the ham slices add a rich, savory touch. Bold and hearty, it's a feast any Nod-Krai local would give a thumbs-up to.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
